CheckTitle: Ensure no EC2 instances allow ingress from the internet to Elasticsearch and Kibana ports (TCP 9200, 9300, 5601).
Description: Ensure no EC2 instances allow ingress from the internet to Elasticsearch and Kibana ports (TCP 9200, 9300, 5601).
Risk: The security group allows ingress from the internet to TCP ports 7000, 7001, 7199, 9042 or 9160. This could allow an attacker to access the Cassandra database.

Recommendation.Text: Modify the security group to remove the rule that allows ingress from the internet to TCP ports 9200, 9300, 5601.
